Lenovo ThinkVision LT2423 - 24" Widescreen LCD Monitor
Enjoy amazing value and uncompromising performance with ThinkVision LT2423 LCD Monitor. This monitor offers a brilliant and responsive 24-inch Full HD display which can maximize your viewing experience whether for work or play. Its minimalistic design along with Tiny PC mounting support allow for a cleaner and a more simplified workspace to increase productivity. LT2423 also sports a powerful stereo speaker which delivers incredible sound quality.
